name: Mega Drain
description: You attempt to drain the life force of a target. Make a ranged attack, doing 1d6 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. Half of the damage dealt is restored to the user.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
